SyncDataView.column_expression: a.jsjbh, b.xphone, c.xfeename, c.xtalktype, xtimestart=convert(varchar(19),a.xtimestart,120), a.xtimelength, xexpense=str(a.xexpense,5,2), a.xthirdid
SyncDataView.table_name: from xuserdetail a inner join xuser b on a.xuserbindid = b.xuserbindid inner join xfeetable c on a.xfeetableid = c.xjsjbh
